title: Guilford Courthouse National Military Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Battlefield Visitor Center2332 New Garden Road, Greensboro NC 27410(336) 288-1776Closed Monday! Open Tuesday - Sunday from 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. The facility is closed on Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Years Day.Tour RoadOpen to vehicles from 8:30 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. every day except Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Years Day. Tour Road Comfort Station Restrooms, water fountains, trash, and recycling containers. Stop #6 on the tour road Open 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. every day except Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Years Day. Colonial Heritage Center and Hoskin's Farm 220 New Garden Road, Greensboro NC 27410 Currently closed for the season! Will re-open Memorial Day weekend 2016. Can't wait that long? School group tours are available by reservation. Please call (336) 288-1776 to inquire about reservations. Nathanael Greene Library2332 New Garden Road, Greensboro NC 27410  The Library is open to the public by appointment only and subject to the availability of staff. The library will be closed on all federal holidays. Click here for library information and policies.
